This extension is free to download from the Chrome Web store, and you can uninstall it at any time.

At Sortiga70s.com, we believe that every browsing session should begin with a sense of calm and serenity. Our 70s Retro Tab extension has been crafted with this very idea in mind. With every new tab you open, you'll be transported to the beauty of a random, funky 70's background. It's the perfect way to kickstart your browsing experience and leave behind the chaos of the digital world for a moment.
The Features That Set 70's Retro Tab Apart:

1. Retro Aesthetics: Immerse yourself in the vibrant hues and iconic designs of the 70s. 70s Retro Tab transports you to a nostalgic world every time you open a new tab.

2. Search Bar: Our extension doesn't just offer style; it's also packed with substance. Enjoy a user-friendly search experience with our modern search bar, seamlessly integrated into the vintage vibes of the 70s.

3. Personalization Options: Customize your new tab experience with a range of options. Choose from a variety of retro themes, adjust color schemes, and make 70s Retro Tab uniquely yours.

4. Convenient Web Search provided by Microsoft Bing
We've partnered with Bing to offer you a convenient web search experience right from your new tab. Easily search for your favorite topics, images, videos, and news without having to navigate away from your start page. The power of Bing's search results is at your fingertips, delivering relevant and timely information when you need it most.

Don't wait any longer to transform your daily browsing routine into a 70s, psychedelic journey. Experience the soothing power of the 70s Retro Tab and give your digital life a breath of fresh air. Let your stress melt away with every new tab you open.
